questions.title: Design a Distributed File Storage System
questions.prompt: Design a distributed file storage system (upload, download, metadata, replication) with reliability and scalability in mind.
followups: How do you ensure durability under failures?
How do you handle large files and streaming?
What consistency guarantees do you provide?

questions.title: Design a Real-Time Chat System
questions.prompt: Design a real-time chat system with online presence, message delivery guarantees, and read receipts.
followups: How do you handle offline users?
How do you ensure message ordering per conversation?
How do you prevent duplicate deliveries?

questions.title: Implement a Thread-Safe LRU Cache
questions.prompt: Implement an LRU cache and make it safe for concurrent access with minimal contention.
followups: What lock granularity would you use?
What are potential deadlocks and how do you avoid them?
How do you measure contention?

questions.title: Design a Job Scheduler
questions.prompt: Design a job scheduling system that supports retries, backoff, priority, and worker scaling.
followups: How do you ensure at-least-once vs exactly-once execution?
How do you avoid duplicate work on retries?
How do you monitor stuck jobs?

questions.title: Design an Authentication System
questions.prompt: Design an authentication system (login, token issuance, refresh, revocation) for a web + mobile app.
followups: How do you store secrets/tokens securely?
How do you defend against replay attacks?
How do you handle account takeover scenarios?

questions.title: Scalable Notifications Service
questions.prompt: Design a notifications system that supports email/SMS/push with retries, throttling, and user preferences.
followups: How do you prevent spamming users?
How do you handle provider outages?
How do you ensure idempotency?

questions.title: Debugging: Memory Leak Under Load
questions.prompt: A service slowly increases memory usage and crashes after hours under load. Describe how you would find the root cause and fix it.
followups: How do you distinguish leak vs cache growth?
What tools/telemetry would you use?
How do you validate the fix in production safely?

questions.title: Design a Multi-Tenant Database Strategy
questions.prompt: Design a multi-tenant system for enterprise customers. Explain data isolation, scaling, and migration strategy.
followups: Shared DB vs separate DB per tenant?
How do you handle noisy neighbors?
How do you backup and restore per tenant?

questions.title: Implement a Mini Compiler Pipeline (High Level)
questions.prompt: Describe a high-level design for parsing an input language into an AST and evaluating it. Include error reporting.
followups: How do you represent tokens and AST nodes?
How do you produce helpful error messages?
What tests would you write first?

questions.title: Design a Feature Store for ML
questions.prompt: Design a feature store that serves features for training and for online inference with consistency considerations.
followups: How do you avoid training/serving skew?
How do you version features?
How do you monitor feature drift?

questions.title: High Throughput API Gateway
questions.prompt: Design an API gateway for multiple services with authentication, rate limiting, logging, and routing at high throughput.
followups: Where do you enforce authz vs authn?
How do you implement rate limiting at scale?
How do you handle partial outages?

questions.title: Distributed Rate Limiter
questions.prompt: Design a distributed rate limiter that is accurate enough but resilient under failures.
followups: Token bucket vs leaky bucket?
How do you handle clock skew?
How do you prevent a thundering herd?

questions.title: Consistency Trade-offs in Sync
questions.prompt: You are designing data sync across devices. Explain strong vs eventual consistency trade-offs and choose one for a notes app.
followups: What user-facing bugs appear under eventual consistency?
How do you resolve conflicts?
How do you test concurrency issues?

questions.title: Security: Threat Modeling an API
questions.prompt: Threat model a public API endpoint and propose mitigations (auth, validation, rate limiting, logging).
followups: What is the highest-risk threat and why?
How do you handle secrets in logs?
How do you test security controls?

questions.title: Performance: 99th Percentile Latency
questions.prompt: A service meets average latency targets but fails at p99. Explain how you diagnose and fix tail latency.
followups: What causes tail latency in distributed systems?
How do you instrument p95/p99 effectively?
What mitigations reduce tail latency?

questions.title: Design a Reliable Event Processing System
questions.prompt: Design an event processing system that ingests events, processes them, and stores results reliably with replay support.
followups: How do you ensure exactly-once vs at-least-once processing?
How do you handle schema evolution?
How do you support replay without double counting?

questions.title: Concurrency: Deadlock Investigation
questions.prompt: A multi-threaded app occasionally deadlocks in production. Describe your process to identify and fix it.
followups: What telemetry helps detect deadlocks?
How do you reproduce it?
What design changes prevent it long-term?

questions.title: Design a Search Service (High Level)
questions.prompt: Design a search service that supports indexing, querying, ranking, and pagination.
followups: How do you build and update the index?
How do you rank results efficiently?
How do you handle spam/abuse?

questions.title: Large-Scale Data Migration Plan
questions.prompt: You must migrate billions of records to a new schema with minimal downtime. Outline a safe plan.
followups: How do you validate correctness during migration?
How do you rollback if issues appear?
What metrics do you monitor?

questions.title: Behavioral: Cross-Team Influence
questions.prompt: Tell me about a time you influenced a decision across teams without direct authority.
followups: How did you build trust?
How did you handle pushback?
What was the outcome?
